summary: A patch to make Telthalion\'s Witchplate armor inline with Skyrim Redone.
descriptionHtml:
Installation:

You must first install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6685]Witchplate Armor[/url] mod then download the compatibility patch and simply activate it in your plugin\'s list instead of the original ESP.


Changes:

The heavy variant has stats slightly better than Ebony armor, due to it needing quicksilver to forge as well as Ebony ingots, tempering also requires the appropriate smithing perk. I did the same with the light version of the armor, slightly better than glass armor and requires quicksilver to make, tempering also requires the appropriate perk. I added meltdown recipes for every piece as well.

Compatible with Version 0.99.21.1 of SkyRE

Special thanks to:
T3nd0s for making Skyrim Redone
Telthalion for his awesome Witchplate armor
author: Synobal
